item.title: Lindsey add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "I know that even now, having watched enough television, you probably won't even refer to them as lepers so as to spare their feelings. You probably call them 'parts-dropping-off challenged' or something." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Lindsey add a quote by Christopher Moore
Lindsey add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "Don't be ridiculous, Charlie, people love the parents who beat their kids in department stores. It's the ones who just let their kids wreak havoc that everybody hates." -- Christopher Moore
